!4 1. Add the Version Checker
|script|browser test                                |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                          |
|ensure|is not visible on page|Maven Version Checker|
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo?edit'])    |
|# Write the symbol                                 |
|press |PAGE_DOWN                                   |
|press enter                                        |
|press |!Version                                    |
|press |Checker                                     |
|# Save and check if visable                        |
|click |xpath=(//input[@type= 'submit'])            |
|ensure|is visible on page    |Maven Version Checker|

!4 2. Remove the Version Checker
|script    |browser test                                |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                              |
|ensure    |is visible on page    |Maven Version Checker|
|click     |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo?edit'])    |
|# Delete the symbol                                    |
|press     |PAGE_DOWN                                   |
|#####press|Command+X      ?Waarom kan dit niet?        |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|press     |BACK_SPACE                                  |
|# Save and check if visable                            |
|click     |xpath=(//input[@type= 'submit'])            |
|ensure    |is not visible on page|Maven Version Checker|
